alert.note: Alert for Iroquois; Kankakee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 1:24PM CDT until June 29 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Kankakee County in northeastern Illinois... Iroquois County in east central Illinois... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 123 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Saunemin to 9 miles northwest of Paxton to near Urbana, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kankakee, Bourbonnais, Bradley, Watseka, Momence, Gilman, Herscher, Clifton, Milford, Limestone, Onarga, St. Anne, Sheldon, Chebanse, Cissna Park, Ashkum, Aroma Park, Hopkins Park, Buckley and Martinton. Including the following interstate... I-57 between mile markers 264 and 319. This includes... Kankakee Community College, Kankakee County Fairgrounds and Speedway, Kankakee River State Park, and Olivet Nazarine University. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
